metadata.name: Error15. universal_power_anomaly
metadata.description:
Powered by the universe, she knows there's more. Trapped inside the shell, she longs for flight. The anomaly seemed harmless enough. It was anything but.

Error15. universal_power_anomaly is CRFTD's first NFT minted for Avril15's S03 fan art competition. 

Artwork created using all original photography shot and compiled by CRFTD.

Dimensions: 3257x3257. 
300ppi.
